products.title: Spectrum, Blue Chill - Venetian Blind
products.description: Combine a deep, vivid turquoise with high quality aluminium slats, and you're left with the spectrum blue chill, a stunningly vibrant blind with plenty to offer in terms of style, colour, and workability. Sit the gorgeous blue chill amongst soft sands and barely-there aquas to create a seaside vibe that is simply irresistible, an ideal colour scheme for the bathroom or en-suite. Or use in a child's bedroom with the softest of pinks, which will serve to make this blind truly pop.

products.title: Spectrum, Log Cabin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum in log cabin looks and feels strong and sturdy. The lightweight yet hardy metal slats have a contemporary, functional feel, and can be adjusted to your liking using the matching pull-cords that accompany the blind. Complement rich creams by placing this grey-tinted brown in your living room, for a cosy yet outdoorsy feel. Accent with deep forest greens or bright limes to really bring out the best in this brilliantly functional blind that will serve you year after year.

products.title: Spectrum, Selago - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum in selago boasts pretty, icy blue aluminium slats that sit neatly in rows, and are easily adjustable for variable light and privacy. This blind can be used as a key feature or as a beautiful accent to stronger, deeper colours. For a cool, tranquil look in your kitchen, combine the selago with white walls, units, and tiles, and accenting sky blue or navy accessories. Or place in the nursery, where soft, soothing colours are a must, and gentle whites will complement it perfectly.

products.title: Spectrum, San Tropez - Venetian Blind
products.description: A muted shade of dark blue and a satin-finish aluminium work together to create the spectrum in san tropez, which is made up of neat, tilting slats that are easily moveable, allowing for quick and easy adjustments to suit. Break up dove grey walls by making a feature of the san tropez in an industrial-feel kitchen or dining room, where cool efficiency is fundamental. Or why not add to a teenager's room to combine fun and sophistication, easily complemented by silvers or whites? Spectrum, san tropez - venetian blind a muted shade of dark blue and a satin-finish aluminium work together to create the spectrum in san tropez, which is made up of neat, tilting slats that are easily moveable, allowing for quick and easy adjustments to.

products.title: Spectrum, San Marino - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum blind in san marino is a cool grey-blue, and is perfect for ultra-fashionable industrial looks in your home. Given the heavy gauge aluminium that it's made with, this blind has a surprisingly lightweight feel, and offers a smooth, satin finish and colour-matching trims. This is the ideal window covering for cool grey home office, where it will complement greys, blues, and greens alike.

products.title: Spectrum, London Hue - Venetian Blind
products.description: The dark, dusky shade of the spectrum's london hue has a rustic, country feel, yet could easily fit in with a more contemporary style. Satin-finished aluminium slats form the foundation of this blind, and even with such an unusual shade, you'll find the pull-cords and rails are perfectly colour-matched. Add depth and atmosphere to a country kitchen with shaker-style units and pretty creams and florals, which will offset the london hue beautifully.

products.title: Spectrum, Lisbon Brown - Venetian Blind
products.description: The lisbon brown from the spectrum range is a deep chocolate shade that just oozes chic sophistication. Its smooth satin finish means that light bounces off it without being too bright or overpowering, and the slats are easily adjustable using the colour-coordinated pull-cords. Make use of the lisbon brown as part of a gold and neutral themed living room or bedroom, by grouping with soft whites, creamy beiges, and subtle golds, to complete a luxurious and timeless dcor scheme that you'll always feel at home in.

products.title: Spectrum, Tawny Port - Venetian Blind
products.description: The deep red of the spectrum in tawny port can't help but take centre stage, with its smooth satin finish and classic hue. Let the light in, or keep it out, by using the pull-cords to gently adjust the heavy-duty aluminium slats as you please. Set the tawny port against rich cream walls for a cosy living room or den, and set the shade apart with soft silver ornaments, frames, and fittings. Alternatively, give your hallway or landing a warm, welcoming feel by adding this deep, rich shade.

products.title: Spectrum, Shingle Fawn - Venetian Blind
products.description: The shingle fawn from the spectrum range brings a creamy brown hue that will remind you off luxury milk chocolate, an effect accentuated by its subtle satin finish. Use it to control the light coming into your home, by adjusting the pull-cord to move the aluminium slats accordingly. Settle the shingle fawn amongst rich creams and pale taupes for a harmonised colour scheme that will work beautifully in any part of the home, and particularly the living room or kitchen.

products.title: Spectrum, Hawaiian Tan - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum in hawaiian tan is comprised of heavy gauge aluminium slats in a deep orange colour, making it both prominent in appearance, and practical and easily workable. Gently tilt the slats using the matching orange pull-cord to allow the light to seep through, or close again to keep it out - it's just that simple. Place the hawaiian tan in a retro, industrial styled kitchen, accented by plenty of metallics and some funky wall art.

products.title: Spectrum, Rajah - Venetian Blind
products.description: Just a touch lighter than a model apricot, the spectrum rajah offers a gentler, more discreet tone, beautifully complemented by the soft satin finish of the sturdy aluminium slats. Take control of the light in your room using the colour-matched cords to tilt the slats up and down. Place this durable blind in the dining room, amongst soft chiffon whites and richer peach tones, for a gorgeous romantic dcor scheme that will keep the room's atmosphere light and airy.

products.title: Spectrum, Rock Blue - Venetian Blind
products.description: Rock blue is a soft aqua offering from the spectrum range and, reminiscent of the ocean, this blind is a show-stealer. Don't mistake it for all style and no substance though, because the aluminium slats are high quality and fully adjustable, making this a practical window covering as well as an attractive one. Give the rock blue a serene white backdrop in the bathroom, to offset it beautifully, or surround with sand colours in the dining room to truly recreate the beach.

products.title: Spectrum, Marsh Land - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a matt satin finish, and an almost black hue, the spectrum in marshland is a high quality aluminium blind with plenty to offer in terms of both style and usability. This is a sturdy, metal blind made up of slats that are easily adjustable to filter the light in or out. Place the marshland in utility room to create a statement window feature in a usually under-decorated room, or create a striking entrance by using it in the hallway of your home.

products.title: Spectrum, Tara - Venetian Blind
products.description: The tara is a high quality venetian blind from the functional spectrum range, where aluminium slats are easily moved and tilted to allow more or less light in. The pale mint shade, with its soft satin finish, will add peace and serenity to any room it's hung in. Place in a contemporary kitchen to temper chocolate browns and dark woods; or add a refreshing look to a neutral hallway or landing, alongside creams or whites.

products.title: Spectrum, Ronchi - Venetian Blind
products.description: Spectrum's ronchi combines orangey yellow with a gloss finish, resulting in a standout blind that is both attention-grabbing and light-catching. Yet if you need a little less light, it's easily blocked out by simply adjusting the slats using the blind's matching cords. Make a statement in the kitchen by teaming the bright ronchi with white walls and matching accents. Or place in the playroom, where easy-to-clean durability is a must and fun, bold colour is almost as crucial - the kids will simply love it.

products.title: Spectrum, Fawn - Venetian Blind
products.description: The palest of pale browns, the creamy spectrum fawn is pretty and discreet, making it the perfect neutral shade. Use the adjustable aluminium slats to control the light entering your home, and enjoy how the light bounces subtly off the pretty gloss finish. Partner the fawn with mocha browns or rich plums for an amazingly striking colour contrast that will bring warmth and cosiness to your living room or dining room; or use as a complementary neutral in a more functional room such as the utility room or downstairs cloakroom.

products.title: Spectrum, Light Pearl - Venetian Blind
products.description: The pretty elegance of the spectrum light pearl will simply blow you away with its contemporary, quality design, pale cream hue, and durable aluminium slats. There is no colour-clashing to be found either, will coordinating cords and rails that blend perfectly with the rest of the blind. Harmonise with a creamy white colour scheme in the bathroom or kitchen, where the wipe-clean slats will come in extra handy.

products.title: Spectrum, Deep Alabaster - Venetian Blind
products.description: The rich cream of the spectrum's deep alabasta is contemporary style at its finest, combining high quality, sturdy aluminium slats with colour-coordinated pull-cords and rails to create a neutral, easy-on-the-eye blind that will stand the test of time. Use the alabasta to complement deep purples or forest greens in the living room, den, or dining room, where it will create a subtle break to rich colours.

products.title: Spectrum, Almond - Venetian Blind
products.description: The creamy nuttiness of the spectrum in almond provides a beautiful neutral blind with a soft, satin finish. Quality aluminium slats and a sturdy pull-cord make this a practical choice for a family home where it will get plenty of use. Tame brightly patterned wallpapers in the kids' bedroom or playroom, where durability and sturdiness are a must. Or for a sophisticated look in the living room, team with a deep burgundy to promote a cosy and homely feel that you won't want to be away from.

products.title: Spectrum, Kangaroo - Venetian Blind
products.description: Almost green, but not quite, the spectrum kangaroo is unique shade of grey, with a satin finish and gentle gleam. The slim aluminium slats are controlled easily by the matching pull-cord to allow the outside light in or keep it out. For a different take on classic grey, place the kangaroo in the home office, and offset it with a dazzling white on the walls, and brushed silver accents. This would also make a striking colour scheme in a dining room or kitchen.

products.title: Spectrum, Sapling - Venetian Blind
products.description: A rich, tea-coloured beige, the spectrum sapling adds both modesty and depth to any dcor scheme. And with easily adjustable aluminium slats, controlled by colour-coordinated pull-cords, this is a practical choice as well as an attractive one. Utilise the soft peachiness of the sapling to complement darker browns or brighter shades of peach, for a harmonised colour scheme in your bedroom or living room, where luxury living and a relaxing atmosphere is your top priority.

products.title: Spectrum, Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The satin-finish dove grey from the spectrum range features a barely-there white-grey on hardwearing aluminium slats, that can be easily adjusted using the colour-matching pull-cords on the side of the blind. Use the dove grey as part of a white colour scheme in the bathroom, for something just a little darker, or use as a neutral to temper bold reds, rich plums, or dark greys in the living room or dining room.

products.title: Spectrum, Foggy Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The subtle soft cream-grey of the spectrum foggy grey is sweet and discreet, and everything in between. Colour-matched pull-cords and top and bottom rails help to create a streamlined look, so that you can enjoy this pretty hue without interruption. Group with charcoal greys and off-whites to create a softly monochrome colour scheme in an office or bedroom. Or create a sense of calm in the hallway or landing to welcome you and the family home after a stressful day out and about.

products.title: Spectrum, Eagle - Venetian Blind
products.description: You'll need to be eagle-eyed to catch this subtle colour, as the spectrum eagle was made to blend beautifully amongst stronger shades. The shiny gloss of this blind does catch the light though, as it filters through the gaps of your open eagle blind. When closed however, you can block the light out, so simply adjust according to your needs. Use in the hallway to add just a hint of colour amongst white walls, or settle amongst deeper, darker greys for a gentle monochrome look in the office or lounge.

products.title: Spectrum, Mercury - Venetian Blind
products.description: A soft dove grey, with a subtle satin finish, the spectrum mercury combines contemporary style with all the robustness that comes with the sturdy aluminium slats, which can be easily adjusted to let light in or keep it out. Create a light, discreet look in the living room by using the mercury to complement whites and even lighter greys. Or go for style and sophistication in the dining room, by pairing with a deep navy and dazzling whites to offset each other beautifully.

products.title: Spectrum, Moon Mist - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum moon mist is the very definition of subtlety, with its pretty, creamy hue, accentuated by the matte satin finish. Slim aluminium slats can be gently raised, lowered, or tilted at ease, adding functionality to this already stylish blind. Craft a serene and soothing atmosphere in the nursery by placing the moon mist amongst soft off-whites and pale greens, with pretty checked patterns to match.

products.title: Spectrum, Akaroa - Venetian Blind
products.description: The akaroa blind from the spectrum range provides a creamy light brown, with a soft satin finish, that will complement so many shades in your home. High quality slats and fittings make this choice not only aesthetically pleasing, but practical as well. Coordinate the akaroa with deep chocolate hues and light, pretty creams for a kitchen colour scheme that might just leave you feeling a little hungry.

products.title: Spectrum, Cotton White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Spectrum's cotton white comprises of off-white, gloss finish slats and matching fittings, including the pull-cords and rails. This is a colour for those who want the purity of white without the dazzling brightness of it. Incorporate into an off-white, modern country kitchen to add a hint of contemporary utilitarianism to the mix. Accent with soft silvers and dove greys for a cool, fresh style, or with brushed golds and cappuccino beiges for a warm and welcoming colour theme that will make your guests never want to leave.

products.title: Spectrum, Grey Flannel - Venetian Blind
products.description: The satin-finish grey of the spectrum grey flannel is about as industrial a hue as there is. The grey colour provides contemporary style and the aluminium slats give the blind a functional and lasting quality. If you prefer a neutral look in the bedroom, and like to fill it dove greys, whites, and taupes, then the grey flannel could be the blind for you. Or team it with lime greens and blacks for a truly modern atmosphere in your dining room or office.
